channel.title: CVE Feed for rainafarai -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for rainafarai -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9685|2024-10-10T14:27:42.500Z -- rainafarai -- notification%20for%20telegram
item.description: The Notification for Telegram plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized test message sending due to a missing capability check on the 'nftb_test_action' function in versions up to, and including, 3.3.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send a test message via the Telegram Bot API to all users configured in the settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-9685|2024-10-10T02:06:10.487Z -- rainafarai -- notification%20for%20telegram
item.description: The Notification for Telegram plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized test message sending due to a missing capability check on the 'nftb_test_action' function in versions up to, and including, 3.3.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send a test message via the Telegram Bot API to all users configured in the settings.
